sentences.sCn: 玛格丽特可怜地抽泣着点了点头。

sentences.sContent: Stop sniffing and blow your nose.
sentences.sCn: 别抽鼻子了，擤一擤鼻涕。

synos.tran: 吸，闻；嗤之以鼻；气味；以鼻吸气；吸气声

remMethod.val: 和snuff(vi. 用鼻子吸)一起记

words.tran: 嗤之以鼻的；自命不凡的；微臭的
嗅探器；嗅探犬；以鼻吸毒者

trans.tranCn: 以鼻吸气， 用力吸入
trans.tranOther: to breathe air into your nose noisily, for example when you are crying or have a cold
to breathe air in through your nose in order to smell something
